keys: μικροσκοπική όψη σχετικά με τη σύγκρουση

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:colos_en/140341</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:colos_en/140341</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Odbijajoča žoga na poševni ravnini</string>
            <string language="en">Bouncing ball on inclined plane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufprallen der Kugel auf geneigter Fläche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rebondissement de la boule sur l'avion incliné</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Saltando a esfera em plano inclined</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rimbalzo della sfera sull'aereo propenso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναπηδώντας σφαίρα στο κεκλιμένο αεροπλάνο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Despedir la bola en el plano inclinado</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Natančen prikaz padca žoge na ravnino in njen odboj pri čemer sta žoga in ravnina sestavljena iz delcev povezanih z vzmetmi.</string>
            <string language="en">Realistic simulation of ball falling on the floor and bounces back. Both ball and floor are approximated as a system of interconnected particles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">odboj žoge</string>
            <string language="en">bounce of a ball</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mikroskopski pogled na trk</string>
            <string language="en">microscopic view on  collision</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">animator3d</string>
            <string language="en">animator3d</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Realistische Simulation der Kugel zurück fallend 
auf den Fußboden und die Schläge. werden Kugel und Fußboden 
als System der verbundenen Partikel approximiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Simulation réaliste de boule tombant sur le 
plancher et les rebonds en arrière. La boule et le plancher 
sont rapprochés comme système des particules interconnectées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Simulação realística da esfera que cai no 
assoalho e nos saltos para trás. a esfera e o assoalho são 
aproximados como um sistema de partículas interconectadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Simulazione realistica della sfera che cade sul 
pavimento e sui rimbalzi indietro. Sia la sfera che il pavimento
si approssimano a come sistema delle particelle collegate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρεαλιστική προσομοίωση της σφαίρας που αφορά το 
πάτωμα και τις αναπηδήσεις πίσω. Και η σφαίρα και το πάτωμα
προσεγγίζονται ως σύστημα των διασυνδεμένων μορίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Simulación realista de la bola que baja en el 
suelo y las despedidas detrás. La bola y el suelo se aproximan 
como sistema de partículas interconectadas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schlag einer Kugel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">mikroskopische Ansicht über Zusammenstoß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">animator3d</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rebond d'une boule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vue microscopique sur la collision</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">animator3d</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">salto de uma esfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vista microscópica na colisão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">animator3d</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rimbalzo di una sfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vista microscopica sullo scontro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">animator3d</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αναπήδηση μιας σφαίρας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μικροσκοπική όψη σχετικά με τη σύγκρουση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">animator3d</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">despedida de una bola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">opinión microscópica sobre la colisión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
